title: MHK - React App
description:
An online implementation of the social deduction game Deception: Murder in Hong Kong by designer Tobey Ho.

MHK is a React front-end connected to a Node.js REST API via Socket.IO and the Fetch API. It uses Fetch to initially load user and lobby data. Once users are verified and have loaded their lobby, Socket.IO connects and handles all further communicaton.

title: MHK - Node.js API
description: REST API. Notable Tech: Express, HTTP routing, Socket.IO, CORS. Hosted on Heroku.

title: This Very Website
description: Built using Svelte + SCSS. Hosted on Vercel.
